Text: RE PDS more mediaThanks for all your hard work I think the more coverage the better so I would definitely like to put together something for GEB We do have some other paper by one of the structurers in the group on the same topic that we could use as a fallback Joe Original Message From Haux Katrin Sent Wednesday May PM To Hrgovcic Joseph Cc Bayi Habiba Subject PDS more media Joe Your paper on power demand swaps is in high demand with the trade press The Journal of Derivatives Use Trading and Regulations will run it in their August edition Derivatives Week published it Monday Derivatives Strategy and Risk Management both consider publishing it In addition Global Energy Business and Electric Light Power are interested in running the paper but only one will at the end feature it because both target the same audience However your friend Ann Ku currently is working on a story on weather derivatives in general for Global Energy Business and she proposed to feature Enrons power demand swaps as part of the article if you would be willing and your schedule permits to create another example including quotes and graph different from the one used in the paper on how this tool works for instance for a golf club manufacturer etc This way we would receive coverage in Global Energy Business and could pitch the story to Electric Light Power Please let me know your thoughts regarding this matter Thanks
